about_the_game:
Gorodki (Russian: Городки, lit. 'townlets'; Swedish: Poppi; Lithuanian: Miestučiai) is a folk sport. Similar in concept to bowling and also somewhat to horseshoes, the aim of the game is to knock out groups of skittles arranged in various patterns by throwing a bat at them. The skittles, or pins, are called gorodki (literally "little cities" or "townlets"), and the square zone in which they are arranged is called the gorod ("city").

Its popularity has spread to Karelia, Finland, Sweden, Ingria, parts of Lithuania, and Estonia. In the Scandinavian and Baltic languages, the game has many different names, such as kurnimäng, kriuhka, köllöi, keili, and miestučiai. The Finnish variant is called kyykkä, or Finnish skittles.
Immerse yourself in the world of the traditional sports game "Gorodki" in the new virtual reality! Take on the challenge and show off your throwing skills to knock out all the pieces with as few throws as possible. "VR Gorodki" will give you an unforgettable experience that combines historical heritage and modern technology.

Game Features:

  • Realistic gameplay:
Feel like a real master thanks to accurate physics and detailed graphics.

  • Variety of Figures:
15 different figures to knock out, each with its own unique features and difficulty.

  • Different environments:
Choose the environment to your liking. It could be an enchanted forest, or you prefer a beach holiday, or you want to imagine yourself in the city. Or maybe even on the Moon or Mars?

  • Intuitive Controls:
Use VR controllers for precise and realistic shots, completely immersing yourself in the process.

Discover the art of playing "Gorodki"
Virtual Reality Gorodki offers a unique way to enjoy one of the world's oldest games while maintaining its authenticity and adding modern elements for added excitement. Ideal for new players and veterans alike, this game will be a great addition to your VR library.

Are you ready to take on the challenge and become a master? Put on your VR headset and start playing!

name: VR Gorodki

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or anything newer
  • VR Support: OpenXR, HTC Vive Cosmos, HTC Vive, Oculus CV1, Meta Quest 2 и Oculus Rift S
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
